article.p: Today in OpenBSD commit history, systrace was detonated to make room for pledge(2).

blockquote.pre:
CVSROOT: /cvs Module name: src Changes by: tedu@cvs.openbsd.org 2016/04/25 13:09:25
Removed files: bin/systrace : Makefile alias.c cradle.c filter.c filter.h intercept-translate.c intercept.c intercept.h lex.l openbsd-syscalls.c parse.y policy.c register.c systrace-errno.h systrace-error.c systrace-translate.c systrace.1 systrace.c systrace.h util.c util.h
Log message: boom goes the dynamite

CVSROOT: /cvs Module name: src Changes by: tedu@cvs.openbsd.org 2016/04/25 14:00:33
Modified files: sys/kern : exec_script.c kern_exec.c kern_exit.c kern_fork.c kern_sysctl.c vfs_lookup.c sys/sys : syscall_mi.h Removed files: sys/dev : systrace.c systrace.h
Log message: boom goes the dynamite
